projects.name: Tunisiacars Car Rental
projects.subTitle: Production-ready car rental platform with seasonal pricing and CMS-driven content.
projects.summary: Delivered a full-featured rental experience with advanced car management, locale-aware routing, and CMS-managed media.
projects.description: Built and shipped a car rental platform that supports complex pricing rules (seasonal rates, locations, and reservations), bilingual admin, and live previews across breakpoints. Implemented CMS-managed blocks, editable email templates, and SEO foundations with metadata, Open Graph, sitemaps, and optimized delivery.

projects.name: Masarat Insurance Platform
projects.subTitle: RTL-friendly insurance comparison platform UI overhaul.
projects.summary: Revamped the front-end for a medical insurance comparison product with modern, performant Angular screens.
projects.description: Re-styled and redesigned complex insurance comparison flows, converting nested Angular Material tables into responsive Bootstrap layouts with full RTL support. Improved performance and maintainability while keeping the experience consistent for Arabic and LTR users.
